Text: If you like it i can upload lots of marvel's comics,i have a really big collection
it's my first upload,i tried to make it look ok and easy to use!
i will upload marvel's ultimate xmen,but before i waste my time,is anyone going to download it ???
The first volume of Ultimate Xmen has already been uploaded in the Ultimate Marvel torrents, and the recent issues have been being uploaded by mirrormaster82, wowcabbage and gunninghawk

PS. Always check Pirate Bay for items before uploading to avoid splitting seeds between duplicate torrents

But keep uploading :D

oh thanks for the tip man!
what about Astonishing Spiderman & Wolverine?
i couldn't find a torrent about that
spiderman/wolverine individual issues to make up the story arc were uploaded by another superb comic uploader ShipJ...but I don't think anyone combined them into one torrent...

oh and btw..aside from just searching, in my opinion, you should always check the major comic uploaders (imho); mirrormaster82, wowcabbage, gunninghawk, Joshua13, and ShipJ (he does the O-Day torrents)...just something I do on a regular basis...happy uploading..off to a great start..
thank you for the tips my friend,i'm new as uploader and i don't want a bad start!
